obstacles.descr: Meels woke up this morning covered in boils. We must have incurred the wrath of an angry spirit... or maybe it was the brownish drinking water. What do you do?
obstacles.opA: People get sick all the time! Let's play limbo on the deck
obstacles.opB: Give Meels medicine and keep her quarantined [10 vials of medicine]
obstacles.outcomeA: Yeah that doesn't seem to have been the right answer. I'm sure her blackening flesh will clear up soon though. (-25 Health)
obstacles.outcomeB: Good job, she's feeling much better. Now keep sailing!

obstacles.descr: It seems like just eating hard tack and jerky is not the new keto after all, and now everyone has scurvy!
obstacles.opA: We'll divide our medicine stores evenly [10 vials of medicine]
obstacles.opB: Everyone knows that you cure scurvy by chewing licorice root
obstacles.outcomeA: The crew is bolstered enough to carry on
obstacles.outcomeB: Actually, it was Orlic who said that... the crew remains weak for days (-25 HEALTH)

obstacles.descr: Um... is that big wooden pole supposed to be in two pieces?
obstacles.opA: Orlic comes up with a saw and offers to help
obstacles.opB: Construct a new mast here on the deck [10 logs of wood]
obstacles.outcomeA: Orlic built a swing instead - this ship won't be sailing anytime soon (-25 HEALTH)
obstacles.outcomeB: It looks like that did the trick... for now

obstacles.descr: An old repair in the bilge sprung a leak, and the water is already ankle deep!
obstacles.opA: We'll bail it out one trip at a time
obstacles.opB: Put new planks over the leak and seal it up [10 logs of wood]
obstacles.outcomeA: You remove three buckets of water, but the water's up to your waist - we'll have to seal off the lower decks (-25 HEALTH)
obstacles.outcomeB: It worked! And now we have a hot tub! ... a warm, smelly hot tub...

obstacles.descr:: Meels used the plank as a runway again and fell right off the edge!
obstacles.opA: We'll lower Cas down by her ankles to snatch her up
obstacles.opB: Lower some rope over the edge for her to grab on [10 spools of rope]
obstacles.outcomeA: Cas has so many weapons that she falls in too, and both get pneumonia (-25 HEALTH)

obstacles.descr: A pair of beautiful sirens on a cliff bewitch half the crew
obstacles.opA: Amira suggests we plug our ears with cork [10 vials of medicine]
obstacles.opB: Tie your crewmates to the masts before they jump over [10 spools of rope]
obstacles.outcomeA: 'I CAN'T HEAR THEM ANYMORE! WHAT HAPPENED TO THE BEAUTIFUL WOMEN?' Cas yells. Guess it worked!
obstacles.outcomeB: Cas brandishes a sword and cuts away the rope - you miscalculated how many weapons these pirates have (-25 HEALTH)

obstacles.descr: Isha's foot is caught and they're stuck by the flames, but the inventory is about to catch fire!
obstacles.opA: Ish will be fine, save the booty!
obstacles.outcomeA: Isha's ankle sustains minor burns, so they'll be on bed rest for awhile (-25 HEALTH)
obstacles.outcomeB: Phew, we all made it! Looks like a few things got a little, uh... crispy
